This is the first Champions Cohort "forked" from Openscapes. Read the summary blog post by co-leads Anna Holder and Corey Clatterbuck: [Adapting the Champions Program for the California Water Boards](https://www.openscapes.org/blog/2022/12/02/swrcb-2022/).

This is a mentorship and professional development opportunity for research teams; please see the [Cohort website](https://openscapes.github.io/2022-swrcb/), and [Openscapes Champions Program](https://www.openscapes.org/champions/) for details.
